book.synopsis: Arguing that the U.S. is confronting a difficult economic future--marked by loss of retirement benefits, double-digit inflation, tax hikes, and more--a thought-provoking handbook explains how individual investors can protect themselves and their wealth.
book.title_long: Crash Proof: How to Profit From the Coming Economic Collapse
